select from student a where a.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update student
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id_card_number = #{idCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card_start_date = #{idCardStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
id_card_end_date = #{idCardEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
announce_type = #{announceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
announce_address = #{announceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weixin_number = #{weixinNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq_number = #{qqNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail_number = #{mailNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
relat_address = #{relatAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
home_address = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_reason = #{updateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update student set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_card_number = #{idCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card_start_date = #{idCardStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, id_card_end_date = #{idCardEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, announce_type = #{announceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, announce_address = #{announceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weixin_number = #{weixinNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq_number = #{qqNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail_number = #{mailNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relat_address = #{relatAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, home_address = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_reason = #{updateReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
